DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this trial is to see whether zoledronic acid is better than pamidronate to treat low bone density in heart and lung transplant patients.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Pamidronate With Zoledronic Acid for Transplant Related Bone Loss Prevention
DOC.criteria: reduced bone density as indicated by a bone density T score <1.in either the lumbar spine or femoral neck have undergone or are on the waiting list for heart or lung transplantation are receiving adequate calcium and vitamin D therapy have provided written informed consent prior to participation in the trial untreated hypogonadism, hypothyroidism or hyperthyroidism acute or major organ rejection or intercurrent illness pregnancy or breastfeeding
